SwapBot

A difficult puzzle game that involves a unique swapping mechanic. It has twelve levels of roughly increasing difficulty.

Controls

Move/RotateArrow Keys or WASDSwapX or C or Spacebar or Enter UndoZ or URestartRMute SoundsM

The game should automatically save your progress in your browser's local storage.
